LogicVersionsRegistryInterface","name":"","type":"address"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"develop@teller.finance","details":"The platform settings functions (create, update, and remove) don't include the whenNotPaused() modifier because we might need to use them in both cases (when the platform is paused and not paused). Example: - There is a potential issue and before analyzing it, we pause the platform to avoid funds losses. Finally, as result of the analysis, we decided to update a platform setting (or create a new one for the cloud nodes). In this scenario, if the modifier is present, we couldn't update the setting (because the platform is paused).","methods":{"createAssetSettings(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"assetAddress":"asset address used to create the new setting.","cTokenAddress":"cToken address used to configure the asset setting.","maxLoanAmount":"the max loan amount used to configure the asset setting."}},"createPlatformSetting(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"maxValue":"the max value for the setting.","minValue":"the min value for the setting.","settingName":"setting name to create.","value":"the initial value for the given setting name."}},"exceedsMaxLoanAmount(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"amount to test.","assetAddress":"asset address to test the setting."},"return":"true if amount exceeds current max loan amout. Otherwise it returns false."},"getAssetSettings(address)":{"params":{"assetAddress":"asset address used to get the current settings."},"return":"the current asset settings."},"getAssets()":{"return":"the asset addresses list."},"getPlatformSetting(bytes32)":{"params":{"settingName":"to get."},"return":"the current platform setting."},"getPlatformSettingValue(bytes32)":{"params":{"settingName":"to get."},"return":"the current platform setting value."},"hasPauserRole(address)":{"params":{"account":"account to test."},"return":"true if account has the pauser role. Otherwise it returns false."},"hasPlatformSetting(bytes32)":{"params":{"settingName":"setting name to test."},"return":"true if the setting is already configured. Otherwise it returns false."},"initialize(address)":{"details":"Initializes the contract in unpaused state. Assigns the Pauser role to the deployer."},"initialize(address,address,address,address,address,address)":{"params":{"atmSettingsAddress":"the initial ATM settings address.","escrowFactoryAddress":"the initial escrow factory address.","interestValidatorAddress":"the initial interest validator address.","marketsStateAddress":"the initial markets state address.","pairAggregatorRegistryAddress":"the initial pair aggregator registry address.","versionsRegistryAddress":"the initial versions registry address."}},"initialized()":{"return":"true if contract is initialized. Otherwise it returns false."},"isPaused()":{"return":"true if platform is paused. Otherwise it returns false."},"pause()":{"details":"Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state."},"pauseLendingPool(address)":{"params":{"lendingPoolAddress":"lending pool address to pause."}},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"removeAssetSettings(address)":{"params":{"assetAddress":"asset address used to remove the asset settings."}},"removePlatformSetting(bytes32)":{"params":{"settingName":"to remove."}},"requirePauserRole(address)":{"params":{"account":"account to test."}},"settings()":{"details":"This address should NOT change over the time. See details in the _setSettings(...) function."},"unpause()":{"details":"Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state."},"unpauseLendingPool(address)":{"params":{"lendingPoolAddress":"lending pool address to unpause."}},"updateCTokenAddress(address,address)":{"params":{"assetAddress":"asset address to configure.","newCTokenAddress":"the new cToken address to configure."}},"updateMaxLoanAmount(address,uint256)":{"params":{"assetAddress":"asset address to configure.","newMaxLoanAmount":"the new maximum loan amount to configure."}},"updatePlatformSetting(bytes32,uint256)":{"params":{"newValue":"the new value to set.","settingName":"setting name to update."}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"createAssetSettings(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"It creates a new asset settings in the platform."},"createPlatformSetting(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"It creates a new platform setting given a setting name, value, min and max values."},"exceedsMaxLoanAmount(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Tests whether amount exceeds the current maximum loan amount for a specific asset settings."},"getAssetSettings(address)":{"notice":"Get the current asset settings for a given asset address."},"getAssets()":{"notice":"Gets the current asset addresses list."},"getPlatformSetting(bytes32)":{"notice":"It gets the current platform setting for a given setting name"},"getPlatformSettingValue(bytes32)":{"notice":"It gets the current platform setting value for a given setting name"},"hasPauserRole(address)":{"notice":"Tests whether an account has the pauser role."},"hasPlatformSetting(bytes32)":{"notice":"It tests whether a setting name is already configured."},"initialize(address,address,address,address,address,address)":{"notice":"It initializes this settings contract instance."},"initialized()":{"notice":"Gets if the contract is initialized."},"isPaused()":{"notice":"It gets whether the platform is paused or not."},"pauseLendingPool(address)":{"notice":"It pauses a specific lending pool."},"removeAssetSettings(address)":{"notice":"It removes all the asset settings for a specific asset address."},"removePlatformSetting(bytes32)":{"notice":"Removes a current platform setting given a setting name."},"requirePauserRole(address)":{"notice":"Requires an account to have the pauser role."},"settings()":{"notice":"The gets the settings contract address from the SETTINGS_SLOT."},"unpauseLendingPool(address)":{"notice":"It unpauses a specific lending pool."},"updateCTokenAddress(address,address)":{"notice":"It updates the cToken address for a specific asset address."},"updateMaxLoanAmount(address,uint256)":{"notice":"It updates the maximum loan amount for a specific asset address."},"updatePlatformSetting(bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"It updates an existent platform setting given a setting name.It only allows to update the value (not the min or max values).In case you need to update the min or max values, you need to remove it, and create it again."}},"notice":"This contract manages the configuration of the devdoc.author: develop@teller.finance
devdoc.details: The platform settings functions (create, update, and remove) don't include the whenNotPaused() modifier because we might need to use them in both cases (when the platform is paused and not paused). Example: - There is a potential issue and before analyzing it, we pause the platform to avoid funds losses. Finally, as result of the analysis, we decided to update a platform setting (or create a new one for the cloud nodes). In this scenario, if the modifier is present, we couldn't update the setting (because the platform is paused).

params.assetAddress: asset address used to create the new setting.
params.cTokenAddress: cToken address used to configure the asset setting.
params.maxLoanAmount: the max loan amount used to configure the asset setting.

params.maxValue: the max value for the setting.
params.minValue: the min value for the setting.
params.value: the initial value for the given setting name.

params.assetAddress: asset address to test the setting.

exceedsMaxLoanAmount(address,uint256).return: true if amount exceeds current max loan amout. Otherwise it returns false.

params.assetAddress: asset address used to get the current settings.

hasPauserRole(address).return: true if account has the pauser role. Otherwise it returns false.

hasPlatformSetting(bytes32).return: true if the setting is already configured. Otherwise it returns false.

initialize(address).details: Initializes the contract in unpaused state. Assigns the Pauser role to the deployer.

params.pairAggregatorRegistryAddress: the initial pair aggregator registry address.

initialized().return: true if contract is initialized. Otherwise it returns false.

isPaused().return: true if platform is paused. Otherwise it returns false.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.assetAddress: asset address used to remove the asset settings.

settings().details: This address should NOT change over the time. See details in the _setSettings(...) function.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.

params.newCTokenAddress: the new cToken address to configure.

params.newMaxLoanAmount: the new maximum loan amount to configure.

createAssetSettings(address,address,uint.notice: It creates a new asset settings in the platform.

createPlatformSetting(bytes32,uint256,ui.notice: It creates a new platform setting given a setting name, value, min and max values.

exceedsMaxLoanAmount(address,uint256).notice: Tests whether amount exceeds the current maximum loan amount for a specific asset settings.

getAssetSettings(address).notice: Get the current asset settings for a given asset address.

getAssets().notice: Gets the current asset addresses list.

getPlatformSetting(bytes32).notice: It gets the current platform setting for a given setting name

getPlatformSettingValue(bytes32).notice: It gets the current platform setting value for a given setting name

hasPauserRole(address).notice: Tests whether an account has the pauser role.

hasPlatformSetting(bytes32).notice: It tests whether a setting name is already configured.

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: It initializes this settings contract instance.

initialized().notice: Gets if the contract is initialized.

isPaused().notice: It gets whether the platform is paused or not.

pauseLendingPool(address).notice: It pauses a specific lending pool.

removeAssetSettings(address).notice: It removes all the asset settings for a specific asset address.

removePlatformSetting(bytes32).notice: Removes a current platform setting given a setting name.

requirePauserRole(address).notice: Requires an account to have the pauser role.

settings().notice: The gets the settings contract address from the SETTINGS_SLOT.

unpauseLendingPool(address).notice: It unpauses a specific lending pool.

updateCTokenAddress(address,address).notice: It updates the cToken address for a specific asset address.

updateMaxLoanAmount(address,uint256).notice: It updates the maximum loan amount for a specific asset address.

updatePlatformSetting(bytes32,uint256).notice: It updates an existent platform setting given a setting name.It only allows to update the value (not the min or max values).In case you need to update the min or max values, you need to remove it, and create it again.

userdoc.notice: This contract manages the configuration of the platform.
